title: QR Scanner Feedback System
subtitle: Transform customer feedback into valuable insights. Scan QR codes, leave feedback, and earn coupons.
multiTierDescription: Super Admin, Merchants, and White Label Agents working together seamlessly.
qrCodeDescription: Customers scan QR codes at physical stores to leave instant feedback.
rewardDescription: Customers receive coupons as rewards for their valuable feedback.
step1Description: Merchants purchase subscriptions from Super Admin
step2Description: Merchants hire White Label Agents who purchase points
step3Description: Customers scan QR codes at agent stores and leave feedback
step4Description: Customers receive coupons as rewards for their feedback
